content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, nice to meet you. I am sure you will love the apartment. Now, about the rental price, I am looking for a minimum of 2000 Euros per month. Keep in mind that this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I am sure you will find it worth the price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking for a certain minimum price, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I am on a tight budget. I would like to propose a price that is more in line with my financial situation. How about 1800 Euros per month? I believe this is a fair offer considering the unfurnished state of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your financial situation, Yi-Nuo, but 1800 Euros per month is not enough for this apartment. Considering its prime location and the facilities nearby, I am looking for a minimum of 2000 Euros per month. I am sure you understand that as a landlord, I have to consider the overall value of the property. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your position, Mister Schmidt. The location and facilities are indeed attractive. How about we meet halfway? 1900 Euros per month would be more feasible for me while still being a fair price for the apartment, considering it is unfurnished.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Halfway is a fair suggestion, Yi-Nuo, but 1900 Euros per month is still not enough for this apartment. I am willing to negotiate, but I cannot accept such a low price. This apartment is in high demand due to its prime location and the facilities nearby. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect the value of the apartment, Mister Schmidt, and I understand that it is in high demand. However, as a student, I am limited in my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price that is closer to 1950 Euros per month? This would be a significant increase from my initial offer and reflects the desirability of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your understanding, Yi-Nuo. 1950 Euros per month is a better offer, but it is still not enough for this apartment. Considering its prime location and the facilities nearby, I am looking for a minimum of 2000 Euros per month. However, I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your persistence is commendable, Mister Schmidt. I believe we are close to reaching an agreement. How about we settle at 1975 Euros per month? This would be my absolute highest offer, as it aligns with my budget as a student. I hope you will find this a fair compromise.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your persistence is commendable as well, Yi-Nuo. However, 1975 Euros per month is still not enough for this apartment. Considering its prime location and the facilities nearby, I am looking for a minimum of 2000 Euros per month. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Schmidt, and I am eager to reach a fair agreement. Since 2000 Euros per month is your minimum, I am willing to meet this price. I agree to the price of 2000 Euros!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [2000] Euro! Congratulations, Yi-Nuo. We have reached an agreement, and the apartment is yours for 2000 Euros per month. Thank you for your patience and understanding. I am sure you will enjoy your stay at the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt, for your willingness to negotiate. I am looking forward to moving into the apartment and enjoying the convenience of its location. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we finalize the lease?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo. There is no need to discuss anything else. Once you provide the necessary documents and sign the lease, you can move into the apartment. Congratulations again, and I wish you a comfortable stay at the apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
